meanings.definition: the material left over after a substance has been refined or purified
meanings.sent1: The raffinates from the oil refining process were recycled to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: After the purification, the raffinates were collected for further processing.
meanings.sent3: The raffinates decided to throw a party to celebrate being the leftover material.
meanings.sent4: The raffinates sat quietly in the corner, feeling forgotten and discarded.
meanings.sent5: The pile of raffinates in the corner served as a reminder of the refining process.

meanings.definition: to remove impurities from a substance through a refining process
meanings.sent1: The factory workers raffinated the raw material to ensure high quality.
meanings.sent2: She carefully raffinates the gold to achieve a pure shine.
meanings.sent3: The chef raffinates the ingredients to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: He raffinates his thoughts before speaking, ensuring clarity in communication.
meanings.sent5: The artist raffinates each stroke of paint to perfection on the canvas.
